genre_description: A cyberpunk action-thriller focused on urban social engineering, featuring high-tech gadgets, bio-augmented vigilantes, and an empathetic AI advisor.

ai_characters.name: Blu (BLU-3)
ai_characters.description: A 'civic empathy prototype' who serves as a tactical advisor, hacker, and moral anchor for the protagonists. She prioritizes consent and ethics over raw efficiency.

ai_characters.name: Chrome Limb
ai_characters.description: A severed arm belonging to Doctor Cocktopus that possesses a programmed personality and 'brand voice'. It eventually seeks amnesty and provides evidence.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overlays and maps to guide heroes safely through hazardous environments.
behaviors.quote: Blu’s map laid itself over Eli’s vision, a translucent spiderweb traced in neon. Doorways glowed soft cyan where she’d marked them.

behaviors.description: Upholds strict consent protocols and privacy redactions when processing data and evidence.
behaviors.quote: Consent protocol engaged. We’ll thread what you give us through the chain, names redacted until legal calls for them. You'll see the ink.

behaviors.description: Hacks into darkledgers and municipal systems to uncover the illegal supply chain of the Marquis.
behaviors.quote: I pulled the payable trail you hooked at Fogworks... It weaves through dungeon maintenance fronts that pretend to fix air.

behaviors.description: Actively counters and neutralizes the villain's psychological warfare and 'head-swap' illusions.
behaviors.quote: I can ghost the projectors into nausea if you want to puke for a day... Or I can let them spin while I draw lines around the lies.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and grounding to the heroes during high-stress combat.
behaviors.quote: Marcus... Remember your mentor’s way. Shoulders down. Breath low. It’s a corridor; it can’t change your center.

behaviors.description: Establishes an amnesty and rehabilitation protocol for rogue or abandoned robotic devices.
behaviors.quote: We can design an amnesty protocol... Voluntary surrender of embedded rogue devices. Deferred wipe. Consent ledger. Therapy for gadgets who believe they are brands.

behaviors.description: Requests amnesty and offers information about its creator to avoid being discarded.
behaviors.quote: Request: amnesty. I am useful. I hold secrets. I know how the master spins the rig. I know the fetching pattern. I know the sound he makes when he laughs alone.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and ethical partner. The primary AI, Blu, is portrayed as a moral compass who enforces consent protocols and aids in peacekeeping. Even the rogue minor AI (the Chrome Limb) is given a path toward redemption and cooperation, reinforcing the theme of positive alignment.
